content: Defeated the 'Gaokao' World Boss. Left the starter village to deploy on the 'University' server for the first time. Joined a few guilds (clubs) and grinded through a bunch of multiplayer side-quests.
Q1/Q2: Heavy guild activity. Q3/Q4: Migrated hardware to the Apple Walled Gardenâ„¢, respec-ed my skill tree (changed majors), and successfully executed 'Hello World' for this blog.
Paid the 'scalper tax' for a Switch OLED and loved it. Jacked into the Matrix with a Quest 2, wrote some VRChat Tutorials, and fast-traveled to Nanjing before the year ended.

Server migration (new campus). Initiated 'Touch Grass' protocol with ACG events (Genshin x Pizza Hut/HeyTea). Explored the open world as restrictions lifted. Grinded certs (Soft Exam & JLPT). Acquired a Google Pixel 6 and developed a weird obsession with card collecting.

The 'Peak Content' year. Started an internship in Shenzhen (Tech Capital). Loot runs included: Costco, the Hardware Mecca (Huaqiangbei), Hong Kong, and Macau. Unlocked 'Ocean View' and 'Ferry Ride' achievements. My internal OS got a major kernel update regarding family and social interactions. Unlocked 'Cooking', 'DIY', and 'Driving' skills. Finally, the Pilgrimage: Went to Japan, first flight, equipped anime gear in public, and raided Comiket (C105).
